description: This file is a Python script used for testing the reasoning_content generation in the ReasoningTools component of the project. It creates agents, runs them in streaming and non-streaming modes, and checks for the presence of reasoning_content in the responses.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that interacts with language models and tools.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for OpenAI chat models.

classes.name: ReasoningTools
classes.description: Tools for reasoning and content generation within the agent.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the agent with a given prompt, optionally in streaming mode.
